text: Jogesh Chandra Barman was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Falakata Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly 1991, 1996, 2001 and 2006. He was the Forest and Backward Class Welfare Minister of West Bengal Government. He died on 10 February 2019 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:State cabinet ministers of West Bengal Category:West Bengal MLAs 1991–1996 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1996–2001 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2001–2006 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2006–2011
title: Jogesh Chandra Barman
